summary: Add support for aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu build target for Rust Core to enable building containers on M1 Macs. The aarch64-apple-darwin target is already supported, but users need the Linux ARM64 GNU target for cross-compilation to Linux containers.
userImpact: Users building Docker containers on M1 Macs cannot target Linux ARM64 without this build target support.
proposedFix: Add aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu to the list of supported Rust Core build targets
resolutionDetails: The aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu target was added to the Rust Core build targets
keyQuote: Mostly to support building containers on M1 macs
